text: Loads a template file of stored display states
You can load a file thats saved with
which restores the display flag state of current /obj level nodes to the ones from the saved file.  This makes it very easy to switch on/off certain items for a variety of use cases, together with
Set as Viewport Camera with State
allows you to quickly change the visibility of items for specific camera views.

title: Load /obj Display State
summary: Loads a template file of stored display states
